<title level="1" right="Trait">[Monk](/Traits.aspx?ID=656)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 282 <sup>2.0</sup>

Abilities with this trait are from the [monk](/Classes.aspx?ID=8) class. A weapon with this trait is primarily used by monks.
name: Monk
